title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, November 6, 2021
description: It’s the birthday of poet Anne Porter (1911). She published her first collection, “An Altogether Different Language” in 1994 when she was 83 years old.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of poet Anne Porter (1911). She published her first collection, “An Altogether Different Language” in 1994 when she was 83 years old.
